text: @dcexaminer @chicagosmayor Chicago Mayor Lightfoot blaming the coronavirus for Killings screams Her Massive Failures in Governance of the City is precisely why Hundreds more Chicagoans will be Injured and Killed.Residents must Demand Her Resignation AND should consider President Trump's offer for help.
